title: Buffalo Chicken Pasta
directions: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the first seven ingredients. Cook, covered, on low 4-5 hours or until chicken is tender. Cook pasta according to package directions for al dente; drain.
Remove slow cooker insert. Stir in cheese until melted. Add pasta, sour cream and ranch dressing. If desired, top with celery. Yield: 8 servings.
ingredients: 2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 cans (10-3/4 ounces each ) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
